name: Knives
bio: With more than a decade of DJing experience and over a dozen residencies spanning two states, DJ Knives is probably already one of your favorite DJ's favorite DJ. As an open format wizard Knives plays every genre you know, such as Hip-Hop, Pop, Top 40, Latin, EDM, and more, while cohesively blending BPMs and styles together throughout a night to make crowds of diverse ages, races, and backgrounds dance non-stop. Turning his passion for underground House & Techno into San Francisco Based promotion company and artist collective Dirty Not Sorry, Knives has become a local taste maker in the SF scene, bringing many national and international artists to the city for the first time, as well as extending the platform to hundreds of local DJs and producers. Catch him on one of his weekly "Dirty Wednesday" livestreams on the Dirty Not Sorry Twitch channel spanning over 150 episodes where he shares brand new Dirty House and Techno music every single week.
